Summary._: Southbound [E] and [F] train service is running with delays because of signal problems at 75 Av.

Description._: Southbound [E] and [F] train service is running with delays because of signal problems at 75 Av.

LongDescription:
Some southbound [E] and [F] trains are running local from Kew Gardens-Union Tpke to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av because of signal problems at 75 Av.
Expect delays on the [E], [F], [M] and [R] trains.
Our crews are on scene working to fix it as soon as possible and we'll follow up soon. Stay tune for updates.

Summary._: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE  [SIR] Service runs on an adjusted schedule in both directions

Description._: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE  [SIR] Service runs on an adjusted schedule in both directions

LongDescription: <b><i>SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[SIR] Service runs on an adjusted schedule in both directions</b>Days, 9 AM to 3 PM, Mon to Fri, Feb 12 - 16<br><br> Tottenville-bound trains depart 2 minutes <i>later</i> than regularly scheduled.<br><br> St George-bound trains depart 5 minutes <i>earlier</i> than regularly scheduled.<br><b></b>          </font><a href=http://apps.mta.info/traintime/ target=_blank><img height=32px src=http://apps.mta.info/traintime/desktop2Images/logoSm.png></a><br>
